resources.string: "%s requires you to add MIUI service framework to the exceptions list. You may receive notifications from MIUI's built-in apps and other third-party apps."
Connecting to data services when roaming internationally can result in steep charges from your carrier. Allow apps on exceptions list to connect to data services when roaming internationally?
Carrier Access point information set abnormalities
Connect to internet using Mobile data network
Touch to view data usage stats.

"Достигнут предел использованного трафика.
Это может повлечь большие затраты на трафик (в зависимости от оператора)."
Настроить пакет или лимит трафика для %s?
Нажмите, чтобы включить данные в фоне
"Couldn't get verification code. Check your data connection and try again."
Enter the code you receive here
After you receive your verification code, enter it in the box above and tap \"Buy\" to complete your purchase. Note that the code will is only valid for 10 minutes.
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your data connection and try again."
"There's conflict between your current data package and the data package you're attempting to purchase. Check with your service provider for more info."
Yikes! Something went wrong with our server.
"Couldn't buy data. Check with your carrier for more info about the issue. "
"You bought %s For more info check the message you received from your service provider"

Эта функция может помочь вам отслеживать использование трафика мобильного интернета, чтобы предотвратить дополнительные денежные расходы. Для достижения наилучших результатов, установите предел трафика.
"When you're roaming internationally, only apps you've added to the exceptions list can use data services. %1$s hasn't been added to the exceptions list. View exceptions list now?"
Apps on exceptions list will be able to connect to data services when roaming internationally. Add this app to exceptions list?
При ограничении мобильного интернета в фоне, некоторые приложения и сервисы не будут работать, если нет подключения к Wi-Fi
Check your router and try again.
%d apps can connect to data services when roaming internationally
"Couldn't get IP address. If you run into this issue again, try using a static IP address."
"Couldn't get local IP address. To report this issue to MIUI, go to the Report Bug app and send a log from your device."
Show notification after 100KB has been used
Mobile data used during lock screen.
Locked for %1$s | Used %2$s of mobile data
The data limit you set is incorrect
"Слот SIM-карты не поддерживает подключение к мобильному интернету"
%s peak data used | no off-peak data remaining
Connect to internet using Mobile data network

"Your device can't connect to the internet:
1. Make sure you haven't exceeded your carrier's plan's mobile data limit. 2. If you just topped up your device's balance, reboot your device and try again. 3. Your carrier's network's signal may be weak in your current location."
"Couldn't activate SIM card. Make sure your SIM card is inserted properly and that your mobile plan has been activated by your carrier."
"Can't use mobile data to connect to the network"
"Can't using mobile data while roaming to connect to the network."

"There may be a problem with the router you're connected to:
""1. Public WLAN network issues ""If you're connected to a public WLAN network, the number of users connected to that network may be slowing it down or creating connectivity problems. Switch to another network and try again. 2."" Internet service provider issues M""ake sure that your account is in good standing with your Internet Service Provider. 3."" Router hardware issues T""ry rebooting your router or checking the admin settings for your router. 4."" Other router issues R""ead the instructions that came with your router and restore your router to its factory settings. 5."" Make sure your router is connected properly T""ry using another Ethernet cable to connect your router. If you suspect there's an issue with the connection in your home, contact your Internet Service Provider."

"There may be a problem with your SIM card:
1. Make sure your account is in good standing with your carrier. Try using a friend's SIM card and see if you're able to connect normally. 2. If you're using two SIM cards, try switching to the other card and see if you're able to connect normally. 3. Make sure your SIM card and your device's SIM slot aren't damaged. Confirm that the SIM card you're using is properly inserted in your device's SIM tray."
%s used today. Tap to set limit.
%s used this week. Tap to set limit.
%s used this month. Tap to set limit.
%s used this week. Tap to set limit.
Allow app to use mobile data
Connect to data services when roaming internationally
Allow apps on exceptions list to connect to data services when roaming internationally
Проверь, если мобильный интернет работает нормально
Разрешить подключение к сети приложениям, которые работают в фоновом режиме
Отключить интернет, когда превышен ежемесячный лимит трафика
"Don't keep track of a select group of apps' data usage"
Синхронизируйте статистику использования данных с оператором
Измененное сообщение устройство отправит оператору, чтобы синхронизировать статистику использования данных
Показывать статистику использования данных при разблокировке устройсва, за период его блокировки (более 3 минут)
Сообщить, когда использование данных достигнет предела
Показывать использование трафика при заблокированном экране

Включение экономии трафика затрагивает политику безопасности?

Нет. Все данные будут в полной безопасности и останутся приватным без передачи третьим лицам.


Нет экономии трафика?

Сжатие трафика работает только при использовании мобильного интернета (отправка/скачивание файлов)
Использовать сжатие трафика при мобильном интернете
Для этих приложений не будет ограничения трафика
"By using this service, you are agreeing to Opera's Terms and Conditions."
"Your phone number and carrier details will be uploaded to Xiaomi's servers in order to update your data usage info."
"Your phone number and carrier details will be uploaded to Xiaomi's servers to update SMS query templates and to check if this feature is available in your area."
"Your phone number and carrier details will be uploaded to Xiaomi's servers to get more info about data purchasing options."
Local loop back test failed. To report this issue to MIUI, go to the Report Bug app and send a log from your device.
Tap to view available data networks
Apps on exceptions list will be able to connect to data services when roaming internationally.
Allow apps on exceptions list to connect to data services when roaming internationally.
You need to allow this app to connect to the internet for it function normally.
Your data usage info will be displayed in the notification shade. You can turn this feature on or off anytime in Data usage > Settings
"Can't connect to network in this area."
SIM status indicates something may be wrong with your SIM card.
Enquiry code (command in SMS to carrier)
"You won't incur charges for SMS messages used to get your data usage balance from your carrier."
"Couldn't get data SMS format: timed out"
"Received data usage report SMS from carrier. Make sure it's accurate and submit it to us."
Make sure the report is accurate and submit it to MIUI.
Go to the Data usage app in Security Center and try again manually.
Process timed out. Confirm with your carrier that the SMS enquiry code you entered is correct.
You need to get a data usage report SMS from your carrier
Help us improve this feature by sending a report when your data usage info is incorrect or fails to update

"Data usage uses a specially formatted SMS to get your latest data usage from your carrier. If this feature isn't working normally, try updating the data usage SMS format. The new updated format will then be uploaded to our servers."
"Data usage report SMS submitted. We'll get right on it!"
Более подробно о информации вашего пакета трафика, вы можете узнать набрав %2$s (%1$s)
"Your carrier's accounting show you have used %s Update your data usage info?"
" You bought %1$s of additional data this month. This is different from the %2$s you added manually."
" You bought %s of additional data this month. This isn't reflected in the monthly data limit you set manually."
"Your carrier's accounting shows you've used %1$s of your off-peak data this month, this is different from the %2$s you've set manually."
" Your carrer's accounting shows you have %s of off-peak data remaining. You haven't set a limit for off-peak data."
" Your carrier's accounting shows you've used %1$s of your peak-time data this month, this is different from the %2$s you've set manually."
"Your carrier's accounting shows that you have %1$s remaining this month. That's more than the %2$s limit you've set manually."

"You've reached your mobile plan's data usage limit.
If you go over your plans data usage limit, your carrier could charge you additional fees.

Top up now and save 50%."
Использование мобильного интернета после превышения пакета трафика может вызвать высокие денежные расходы
Save 50% when you top up now.
"Слушайте до %1$s песен / %2$s ч. чата / Читайте новости: %3$s"
"Слушайте до 18 песен / 10 часов чата / Читайте новости: 86"
Сжатие будет работать только с мобильным интернетом
Adjust data plan and usage limits
Adjust data plan and usage limits
Ошибка получения обновления. Проверь подключение и попытайся снова.
"Can't test network being shared by Mi PC Suite."
"Can't connect to to the internet using shared connection. Check your computer's internet connection."
